title: Cryptic Math of Digital Currencies
description: The document delves into mathematical equations modeling key cryptocurrency concepts 🎯. It covers AI-optimized yield farming in DeFi protocols 💰, zero-knowledge proofs for privacy-preserving compliance 🔐, and reputation-based governance with expertise tokens 🏆. Threshold signatures enable ethical off-chain decisions ⚖️, while quantum-resistant algorithms safeguard future integrity 🛡️. Meta-DAO hierarchies are optimized via AI for ethical outcomes 🤖📈.
